data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rognes, Knut (2013): A new species in the genus Pseudorhyncomyia Peris, 1952 and the identity of P. deserticola Zumpt and Argo, 1978 (Diptera, Rhiniidae). Zootaxa 3736 (3): 249-264, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3736.3.3
